name: telemetry-taco
description: Lightweight telemetry tool designed to correlate Feature Usage with System Health in real-time

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && poetry run python manage.py runserver
scripts.dev:worker: cd backend && poetry run celery -A core worker --loglevel=info
scripts.migrate: cd backend && poetry run python manage.py migrate
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && poetry run ruff check .
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && poetry run ruff format .
scripts.format:check:backend: cd backend && poetry run ruff format --check .
scripts.check:backend: cd backend && poetry run python manage.py check
scripts.validate:backend: pnpm lint:backend && pnpm format:check:backend && pnpm check:backend
